The '''Communications Office''' is one of the [[Eight Trades]] under the jurisdiction of the [[Liyue Qixing]], specializing in transportation.<ref name="fangju">{{Ref/NPC|Fangju|quote='''Fangju:''' To the best of my knowledge, our office is mainly responsible for transportation in Liyue. We are also involved, where appropriate, with related construction and road management, which is why we have a rather large number of staff.<br>
'''Fangju:''' Good road networks, bridges, waterways, and docks are critical to transporting goods to various locations in Liyue, after all.}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/NPC|Yougui|quote='''Yougui:''' I've heard that the Communications Office is planning on building several small lifts... That will improve the situation, no doubt about it.}}</ref>

The Communications Office mainly handles shipments and transports around Liyue,<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Orioles Bask in Spring, the Heavens Present Auspices}}</ref> and also handles overseas shipping logistics.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Anand|Quote='''Anand:''' I heard there's an agency called the Communications Office in Liyue that specializes in overseas shipping logistics.}}</ref> The Communications Office also oversees some construction and road management projects in Liyue.<ref name="fangju"/>
